ai-tha-ap94:1.4_0: on the path that leads to quenching.
ai-tha-ap94:2.4_0: It’s food that I’m still unfinished.
ai-tha-ap94:3.1_0: Having given a bench with the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap94:4.2_0: with the benches on the bench.
ai-tha-ap94:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap94:4.4_0: The fruit of the benches reed.
ai-tha-ap94:5.4_0: a long time has been great before.
ai-tha-ap94:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap94:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sumedhā.
ai-tha-ap94:8.1_0: For the senior mendicants are pure, good character.
